Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses temp. rerouted near 63rd/ Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses temp. rerouted near 63rd/ Cottage Grove.

#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 63rd/Cottage Grove due to Festival near 63rd/Cottage Grove.

Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, Indiana, 61st, Cottage Grove, 64th, Maryland and 63rd including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via 63rd, Cottage Gove, 61st, Prairie and 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/63rd
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted  buses are temporarily rerouted due to a festival at Halsted/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Marquette, Racine, 63rd, and Halsted including normal streets, due to a festival near Halsted/63rd. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark, #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark, 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted due to, Cubs game near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark, #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted due to, Cubs game near Clark/Addison.

#22 Clark buses will operate via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark.

#152 Addison buses will operate via Addison, Racine, Belmont and Halsted then resume their normal route on Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Roosevelt and 63rd
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and 63rd due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and 63rd due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Howard and Roosevelt, and,
  • between 95th and 63rd, only.

Shuttle buses are available from Roosevelt to 63rd to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
